message: I created http://convore.com/c-2 and today found out I could customize the "c-2" to something more meaningful (cxx, in this case)
but I had given out the c-2 link a couple of times over the past few days, and now all of those are broken
even if that something was just a notice that old links will break

a URL change shouldn't tie up the old url forever (so no new group can use it), but it would be nice to have something that made this less painful, especially if/when it happens for a more popular group
